entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
